resource: 1001592.vtc=true 1001592.derived=false 1001592.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1001592.description=The Toyota 4Runner received the lowest number of problems per 100 vehicles among midsize crossovers/SUVs in the proprietary J.D. Power and Associates 2011 Vehicle Dependability StudySM. Study based on 43,779 consumer responses measuring problems consumers experienced in the past 12 months with three-year-old vehicles (2008 model year cars and trucks). Proprietary study results are based on experiences and perceptions of consumers surveyed October-December 2010. Your experiences may vary. Visit jdpower.com
